exercises.name: Box Breathing
exercises.description: Inhale, hold, exhale, and hold each for 4 seconds.

exercises.name: 4-7-8 Breathing
exercises.description: Inhale for 4, hold for 7, and exhale for 8 seconds.

exercises.name: Pursed Lip Breathing
exercises.description: Inhale for 5 seconds and exhale for 5 seconds with pursed lips.

exercises.name: Diaphragmatic Breathing
exercises.description: Deep breaths focusing on expanding the diaphragm. Inhale for 6 seconds, exhale for 6.

exercises.name: Resonant Breathing
exercises.description: Inhale and exhale slowly, 5 seconds each.
